value.li: Necrons are resilient foes and can regenerate when damaged/destroyed unless their Regeneration Matrix is destroyed Or the damage was caused by an attack that ignored their armour
Necron Wraith's make use of Phase Shifting technology that gives them a chance to avoid taking damage from ranged weapons.
Tyranid Biovore's are mobile living artillery that fire Spore mines, which will drift towards the closest enemy and explode
Deamons are the warp made flesh, the stuff of nightmares and are often capable of shrugging off wounds that would slay a mere mortal.
